thread.title: Sanders Aides Want Him to Turn Down the Volume
thread.title_full: Sanders Aides Want Him to Turn Down the Volume

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Sanders Aides Want Him to Turn Down the Volume
text:
Sanders Aides Want Him to Turn Down the Volume October 12, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
The Guardian : “Out on the campaign trail, Bernie Sanders’ full-throated attacks on the billionaire class have been so loud and passionate that aides have taken to offering him honey, to help soothe noticeably wrecked vocal cords. But when he takes on Hillary Clinton for the first time, in a television studio in Las Vegas on Tuesday night, staff members are hoping he will bring his indoor voice instead of the gravelly bark that has electrified record crowds at rallies.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
